metadata.title: CVE-2021-32610 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In Archive_Tar before 1.4.14, symlinks can refer to targets outside of theextracted archive, a different vulnerability than CVE-2020-36193.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-32610` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-pear - 1:1.10.9+submodules+notgz-1ubuntu0.20.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-pear package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.10.9+submodules+notgz-1ubuntu0.20.04.3').
